name: Jelly Bean Sedum
description: The Jelly Bean Sedum is a eye-catching succulent with small, plump leaves that look just like colorful jelly beans. Its leaves are usually green but turn red or pink at the tips when kept in bright sunlight, making the plant even more attractive. The Jelly Bean Sedum is ideal for pots, hanging baskets, and small gardens, adding a cheerful and playful touch to any space.
